title: Neral the night'sedge
body:
Champion idea Neral the nights edge


super brief lore idea (anyone wanna write up a proper lore please do)

originally part of the kinkou followed out akali. decided to go to the order of shadows (i think thats zeds group) then returned to join akali.

playstyle you have two active abilities and a shit tonne of passives. very mobile squishy glasscannon fighter. (you are a little squishier then miss fortune). however your passives are what keep you alive.

lv 18 stats

1756 hp

1328 mp

23 hp per 5 seconds regen

29 mp per 5 sec regen

.786 atk spd

112 ad

68 armour

43 magic resist

370 movespeed ( highest base movespeed in game not counting cass)

225 atk range (25 more then irelia)

lv 1 stats

467 hp

406 mp

11 hp per 5 secs regen

9 mp per 5 secs regen

0.701 atk spd

67 ad

21 armour

18 magic resist

passive (similar to jarvans passive)

the first attack against an enemy champion deals (1,2,3,4 % max health true damage) at levels 1/6/11/16 + 1 % per 14 bonus ad (assasins usually have and endgame of about 300 bonus ad) so late game 25% max hp true damage. additionally you heal for half the damage dealt increasing by 50% if below 30% health so 75% of damage dealt. (cooldown 6 seconds of being out of combat)

q Active

shadows edge

50,60,70,80,90 mana.

/4/3.5/3/2.5/2 second cooldown

dashes in a target direction (range = to akali ult) micro-stunning all enemies hit (0.05) seconds ( just an interrupt, reset auto attack timers and channel spells) dealing 50,70,90,110,130 + 90%, 105% , 120% ,135%, 150% bonus ad + 50%,60%,70%,80%,90% ap adaptive damage (deals damage according to which resistances the enemy has least of) the animation is similar to Akali's ult she always dashes the full distance

W (passive) blades dance

after using your q your next auto causes you to dash through your target enemy (like warwick q) and ignore 10,15,20,25,30% of their magic resist and armour

E shadow shift Passive

upon killing an enemy champion gain 50-75% damage reduction and for .5 seconds and become true stealthed (like akali) for .5/.75/.1/1.25/1.5 seconds

R ultimate

reap

100,125,150 mana

100/90/80 cooldown

blinks to a target enemy champion dealing 100,150,200 + 90% bonus ad and 60% bonus ap. magic damage and marking them with Hunt

the enemy marked with hunt takes an additional 1% true damage for every 2% missing health they have from Nerals next q

additionally proccing hunt resets her q cooldown

passive upon casting q gain a shield = to 50,75,100 + 100% bonus ad for .75 seconds

p.s i made her base stats low to compensate for her kit ( killing her in one hit is extremely easy due to low resistance stats

she looks a little like a cross between zed, katarina and akali (zeds colour scheme with twin knives as her weapon of choice )

PLEASE give me suggestions on the numbers

AND tell me whether or not you would like to see a champion like this in game

ps. i did the math and a malphite with 100 ap (from rod of ages ) and 200 armour can oneshot her with qr w empowered auto e auto (without keystones){{item:3078}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3095}} {{item:3147}} {{item:3074}} {{item:3158}} {{item:3812}}

replies.body: and thats why average players will never be able to come up with champs because of course they go for the strongest thing they could creat and make it seem way to overpowered and unbalanced your example of Q is legit just akalis ult...
